thread.title: Government’s Largest Energy User Moves Toward Renewable Energy Goals
thread.title_full: Government’s Largest Energy User Moves Toward Renewable Energy Goals

title: Government’s Largest Energy User Moves Toward Renewable Energy Goals
text:
22 Government’s Largest Energy User Moves Toward Renewable Energy Goals 
Renewable Energy World: The U.S. ranks second only to China as the largest consumer of energy in the world. And, in the U.S., the largest single energy user, as well as one of the largest consumers of energy in the world, is the U.S. Department of Defense (DOD). Not surprisingly, energy costs make up a huge part of the U.S. military budget – more than $4 billion per year.
